message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this unique product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1100000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to consider a price of $1025000.
I understand that you need to make a profit, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're trying to save money, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to consider a price of $1050000. This is my final offer before considering other options.
